channel.title: Aihara on QUANTUM INFORMATION WITH TRAPPED IONS
channel.description: Recent content in Aihara on QUANTUM INFORMATION WITH TRAPPED IONS

item.title: Akimasa Ihara
item.description: Akimasa is a PhD student under Professor Rajibul Islam’s group and is working on QuantumION project. He completed his Bachelor’s at Cornell University and has worked with the Oxford Ion Trap Group in the past.
